triples.name: Deep reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Central topic of the survey combining deep neural networks with reinforcement learning.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: Foundational technique using multilayered neural networks combined with RL.

triples.name: Multi-agent reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Core focus of the survey examining multiple learning agents in shared environments.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Fundamental learning paradigm underlying multiagent RL systems.

triples.name: Coordination game
triples.relevance: Game theory concept relevant to efficient coordination among multiple agents.

triples.name: Curse of dimensionality
triples.relevance: Key computational challenge in multiagent RL where complexity grows exponentially.

triples.name: Stationary process
triples.relevance: Nonstationarity is identified as a major challenge when multiple agents' policies change over time.

triples.name: Decentralised system
triples.relevance: Related to decentralised execution approach where agents act on local information.

triples.name: Federated learning
triples.relevance: Related to centralised training and decentralised execution paradigm in multiagent systems.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Broader framework for systems with multiple interacting intelligent agents.
